description.value: As the gap between your intention and your words becomes almost nothing, you find that you don't need to consciously draw the diacritic marks that would embellish or modify your runesâ€”as you draw a rune, it continues to grow outwards like a living thing, applying the exact accent or stress mark you intended for it to have. Whenever you Etch or Trace a Rune, you can choose to also apply one diacritic rune you know to it, as part of the same action.

value.value: You know one or more diacritic runes
